title: Ulysses S Grant National Historic Site: Public Transportation
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Public Transportation              Public Transportation      Metro (formerly Bi-State) is St. Louis' public transportation agency. See their website for details. St. Louis is also serviced by AMTRAK.  Both the St. Louis and Kirkwood stations are options for visiting the park.  See their website for details.
